Annotation.Description: Company = USMF The accounting manager at Contoso has to record the expenditure of Cash for a couple of recent overhead transactions that are necessary to run the business. One transaction was paid by manual check out of the USMF OPER bank account, and the other was paid out of Petty cash. A GL General Journal is created to record the expenses. The 2 transactions\vouchers are created and posted. The posted GL accounts are verified for accuracy
Annotation.Title: Read the note. Then go to General ledger > Journals > General journal.
Click New.

Node.Description: In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Name field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 2 (zero based index)

Annotation.Title: Select GenJrn.
Click Lines.

Node.Description: In the grid, mark the selected row

Annotation.Title: Select this row.
In the Account field, enter '600200' then press tab.
In the Debit field, enter '132.44' then press tab.

Node.Description: In the Offset account type field, enter 'Bank'

Annotation.Title: In the Offset account type field, select 'Bank'.

Node.Description: In the Offset account field, enter ''

Annotation.Description: TODO: Enter guided description for this step
Annotation.Title: In the Offset account field, enter ''

Node.Description: In the Offset account field, enter 'USMF OPER'

Annotation.Title: In the Offset account field, select 'USMF OPER'.
Click New.
In the Account field, enter '600150' then press tab.
In the Debit field, enter '7.50' then press tab.
Click New.
In the Account field, enter '110180' then press tab.
In the Credit field, enter '7.50' then press tab.
Verify the Journal Total Debit and Total Credit amounts are $139.94. Then click Validate.
Click Validate.
Verify the message center contains a message saying "Journal is OK". Then click Post.
Click Post.

Node.Description: In the grid, mark the selected row

Annotation.Title: Verify the message center contains a message saying "Number of vouchers posted to the journal: 2". Then select the Line with account number 600200.
Click Inquiries.
Click Voucher.

Annotation.Description:
Verify the values for the following fields.
In Ledger account 600200: Amount in transaction = 132.44
In Ledger Account 110110-001: Amount in transaction = -132.44
Annotation.Title: Verify the voucher matches the details provided in the note. Then close the Voucher transactions form.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)

Annotation.Title: Select the Line with Account number = 110180.
Click Inquiries.
Click Voucher.

Annotation.Description:
Verify the values for the following fields.
In Ledger account 600150: Amount in transaction = 7.50
In Ledger account = 110180: Amount in transaction = -7.50
Annotation.Title: Verify the voucher matches the details provided in the note. Then close the Voucher transactions form.
Close the Journal voucher form.
Close the General journal form.
